page.title: 20RECREATION. TOURISM
page.content:
This is a very sought after area by tourists and travellers. To cater for their needs a number of Public Houses offer accomodation, restaurant facilities and bar snacks. Some have play areas for children ,too. In common with many of the rural areas of Berkshire some of the large estates have been bought up by wealthy foreigners. The Sheik of Kuwait owns {Bear Place},Hare Hatch, and uses it as a summer residence.
We were also told that one secluded house had provided a secret meeting place for a Princess and her suitor about 30 years ago.
There are,however, only the areas of Common Land-as in Knowl Hill-to provide recreation places for local residents.
